pages.text: The god controlling this world of elves. In the gods' world, she is known as the god of wisdom. She has plenty of knowledge and magic power. She is said to be asked consult and mainly giving knowledge to junior gods to create new worlds.

She wants to punish you who is completely a part of the Dark One. In addition to using light and thunder spells, gather huge amount of power and release lights to demolish dark power around. Get away soon when she starts to gather powers or you instantly vanish ignoring your defence.
